short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate web searches using Bing search engines. Changes default search Bing. Performs 25 bing searches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Search for Bing.
You can click button then random search key. 
It replaces the default search page with Bing, so you can earn Microsoft rewards from normal searches.
